text:
Second shot in as of 1/6/2021!!

So happy to have gotten it! I will say that this second shot has come with arm pain, chills and some pretty butt-kicking muscle aches! Taking ibuprofen and being thankful for the opportunity for this shot!!

#vaccine #COVID19 
#thankful #bodyarmor https://t.co/k6YeKx2RpG
